title: Looking for an Article on New Ligatures
content:
I am looking for a certain article on contemporary ligatures and thought this would be the right sort of place to come and ask for some help.

I remember reading a very interesting piece on some new ligatures that someone had designed, including a very clever 'ing' ligature consisting of a lowercase n with a dot over the stem and a loop attached to the right of the character.

As this was a year or so ago, it may well be a long shot, but if anyone knows where I can find this article again it would be a massive help!
author: Tom Nurse
